unnormalised: Arrey yaar, India vs Pak match kab hai? I thought it was on 15/08 but my friend Raju is saying it's on 16th Aug. Plus, the time is also confusing - 2:30 PM or 3 PM IST? Need to prepone my other commitments, you know!
normalised: Arrey yaar, India versus Pak match kab hai? I thought it was on fifteenth August but my friend Raju is saying it's on sixteenth August. Plus, the time is also confusing - two thirty P M or three P M I S T? Need to prepone my other commitments, you know!
